content:
I’m Victor, currently a PhD student in Statistics at the Institute of Mathematics, Statistics and Scientific Computing (IMECC in Portuguese) in UNICAMP. My main research interests are Data Science, Machine Learning models for Markovian Processes (and their applications in Image Processing) and Bayesian Statistics. I’m also interested in R and Python as tools to connect theoretical contributions and real-world applications by creating and contributing to open-source scientific projects.
I also have smaller side-projects on Data Visualization, Backend Web Development and Artificial Intelligence. You can find some projects, as well as my list of publications and blog posts in this page!
